Frequency Analysis Tool

The following samples were created using a substitution cipher (where each letter is replaced with a particular other letter). Comparing the frequencies of the letters in the sample with the most common letters in English, try to guess which letter corresponds to which.

(The letters E, T, A and O are the most common in English)

00000000000000000000000000

(The pairs TH, ER, ON, and AN are the most common in English)
